snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY XV: EPISODE PROMPTO – Naoshi Mizuta Guest Composer Trailer
snippet.description:
We are excited to be working with renowned composer Naoshi Mizuta who has composed for titles such as FINAL FANTASY XI and FINAL FANTASY XIII-2, is the guest composer on the upcoming DLC EPISODE PROMPTO. Check out the video to get an in-depth look how he approached the music!

Like what you see? Be sure to follow us:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/ffxven
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ffxv
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ffxv/
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/FinalFantasyXV
Website - http://www.finalfantasyxv.com/
